mod.name: Ekko
mod.credits: Basemod, ModTheSpire, Vex'D, Alchyr, StS Discord
mod.description:
A fan mod inspired by the league of legend character Ekko.

        The mod is still W.I.P.
                So if you see anything that can be upgraded or if u have any idea to improve the mod, let me know.
        I still have few ideas for the mod but I intend to add them later.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Powered
cards.description:
Gain 1 temporary Strength and Dexterity.
If you fully apply ekkotheboywhoshatteredtime:Resonance, they become permanent.

cards.name: Powered+
cards.description:
Gain 2 temporary Strength and Dexterity.
If you fully apply ekkotheboywhoshatteredtime:Resonance, they become permanent.

relics.name: Z-Drive Resonance
relics.description:
Basic strikes apply 1 Resonance.
At 3 stacks draw two cards, deal damage equal to your strength and gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: Using his own invention, the Z-Drive, Ekko explores the branching possibilities of reality to craft the perfect moment.

relics.name: Twisted clockwork
relics.description: Whenever you apply Delayed damage or Next turn Block, apply 3 more.
relics.flavorText: It might be illegal but at least it's helpful.

relics.name: Chain armlet
relics.description:
Whenever you receive Weak gain 1 Strengh.
Whenever you receive Frail gain 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: A cool addition to your look.

relics.name: Resonance receiver
relics.description: Whenever you successfully apply a Resonance stack, gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: Ready to play in a band.

relics.name: Bronze tube
relics.description: The first time you generate extra [E] each turn, draw one more card next turn.
relics.flavorText: Some weird science can happen in a that simple tube.

relics.name: Z-Drive Academy
relics.description:
Replaces Z-Drive Resonance. Basic strikes apply 1 Resonance.
At 3 stacks draw two cards, deal damage equal to your strength and gain 4 Block.
Strength and Dexterity gains are increased by 1.
Not gaining Strength or Dexterity during one turn makes you lose 1 of both.
relics.flavorText: Your past seems to have changed.

relics.name: Z-Drive Greediness
relics.description:
Replaces Z-Drive Resonance. Basic strikes apply 1 Resonance.
At 3 stacks draw two cards, deal damage equal to your strength and gain 4 Block.
Activating resonance now gives [E] .
Not activating resonance during one turn gives you 1 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: Maybe you shouldn't be so confident on your capacities. High risk high reward as they say.

relics.name: Z-Drive Project
relics.description:
Replaces Z-Drive Resonance. Basic strikes apply 1 Resonance.
At 3 stacks draw two cards, deal damage equal to your strength and gain 4 Block.
Activating resonance now trigger three times the effects.
Resonance now requires 5 stacks instead of 3 to be activated.
relics.flavorText: Your past seems to have changed.

relics.name: Z-Drive Pulsefire
relics.description:
Replaces Z-Drive Resonance. Basic strikes apply 1 Resonance.
At 3 stacks draw two cards, deal damage equal to your strength and gain 4 Block.
Each [E] gain grants you 1 Strength per [E] .
You can't play Power cards anymore.
relics.flavorText: Your past seems to have changed.

relics.name: Z-Drive SKT
relics.description:
Replaces Z-Drive Resonance. Basic strikes apply 1 Resonance.
At 3 stacks draw two cards, deal damage equal to your strength and gain 4 Block.
All Strikes in your deck are upgraded .
Generates 5 Strikes in your deck on pickup.
relics.flavorText: Your past seems to have changed.

relics.name: Z-Drive Sandstorm
relics.description:
Replaces Z-Drive Resonance. Basic strikes apply 1 Resonance.
At 3 stacks draw two cards, deal damage equal to your strength and gain 4 Block. Playing a card related to another turn will reduce the cost of a card related to another turn in your hand by 1 for the turn .
Generates 5 Defends in your deck on pickup.
relics.flavorText: Your past seems to have changed.

relics.name: Z-Drive True Damage
relics.description:
Replaces Z-Drive Resonance. Basic strikes apply 1 Resonance.
At 3 stacks draw two cards, deal damage equal to your strength and gain 4 Block.
Playing a 0-cost card makes you draw 1 card.
Resonance cooldown never wears off.
relics.flavorText: Your past seems to have changed.

relics.name: Pair of masks
relics.description: Whenever you play an item, add a random colorless cards into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Makes you and your loved one match perfectly.

potions.name: Equilibrium potion
potions.description: Increase your Strength or Dexterity so it reaches the highest one.

keywords.name: Ekkotheboywhoshatteredtime:resonance
keywords.description: When at 3 stacks draw two cards, deal damage equal to your strength and gain 4 Block, can be activated only once per turn per enemy.

keywords.name: Ekkotheboywhoshatteredtime:sheen
keywords.description: Strikes deal additional damage equal to Sheen amount when played directly after a non-Power card (except Strike and Defend).
